headline: AvalonBay Communities, Inc. Declares Third Quarter 2025 Dividends
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., September 18, 2025--AvalonBay Communities, Inc. (NYSE: AVB) (the "Company") announced today that its Board of Directors declared a cash dividend on the Company’s Common Stock (par value $0.01 per share) for the third quarter of 2025. The Common Stock dividend is $1.75 per share and is payable October 15, 2025, to all Common Stockholders of Record as of September 30, 2025.
